description:
In celebration of 30 years, the gender neutral prAna Originals collection is a remix of our greatest 90s hits. It's inspired by the iconic vibes outdoor enthusiasts loved back in the day, but upgraded with modern-day fits and even more Earth-conscious craftsmanship.

Ideal for throwing on to stay warm as you head to or from a climb, the super soft Hurricane Full Zip fleece with retro looks will take you back in time.
name: Prana Hurricane Full Zip Fleece - Mens
